title: My sound volume is turned to off when I'm receiving calls, but I'm still hearing maximum volume.
content:
My sound volume is turned to off when I'm receiving calls, but I'm still hearing maximum volume. 
I have turned my volume all the way down during my calls, but nothing seems to be working. It is extremely loud and obnoxious.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3a XL
